scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.dev: npm run clean:cache && npm run build:dev:watch
scripts.test: npm run test:unit-legacy && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit-legacy: cross-env OAS_LOG_NO_OUTPUT=true TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.jest.json ts-node node_modules/tape/bin/tape 'src/**/*.spec.ts' | tap-spec
scripts.test:unit-legacy:debug: cross-env OAS_LOG_NO_OUTPUT=true TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.jest.json node -r ts-node/register --inspect-brk ./node_modules/tape/bin/tape 'src/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.test:unit:name: npm run test:unit -- --coverage=false --updateSnapshot --verbose --testNamePattern
scripts.test:integration:name: npm run test:integration -- --updateSnapshot --colors --verbose --testNamePattern
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:cache
